text:
This just in: Eminem uses dating apps to find potential partners, because celebrities are just like us, I guess?

The rapper recently sat down with Vulture to talk about his new album Revival, but he also opened up about his love life. Em's been single for a while now, and it turns out that he's turned to the internet for a quicker, easier way to meet new people.

"It's tough. Since my divorce I've had a few dates and nothing's panned out in a way that I wanted to make it public," he said. "Dating's just not where I'm at lately."

When asked if he uses dating apps to meet people, the rapper admitted to using Tinder.

"And Grindr," he said, adding, "I also used to go to strip clubs. What can I say? Going to strip clubs is how I was meeting some chicks. It was an interesting time for me."

Whatever works, right? In any case, Eminem doesn't seem stressed about being single, with the rapper explaining, "Am I lonely? No, I'm good. Thanks for asking though."

It was Em's earlier Grindr mention had some fans convinced that he was low-key coming out as gay or bisexual, Us Weekly reports.

everyone thinks eminem is gay again is it 2014 — trina (@stankonia313) December 19, 2017

Eminem: “I use tinder to find dates... and Grindr” pic.twitter.com/uOu4u5NiwT— JushForLife (@BoomBoomGay) December 19, 2017

Eminem being gay makes all the sense.... ALL THE SENSE — New Coach Alert (@FancyFour) December 19, 2017

Eminem is really gay?? Omg — Prince👽 (@princeshanghai) December 19, 2017

There's been a lot of great journalism in 2017, but the reported who didn't ask Eminem any followup questions about using Grindr has let down their entire profession https://t.co/sVTD6qr1lw— Elijah Clark-Ginsberg (@eclarkginsberg) December 19, 2017

me reading that Eminem uses Grindr pic.twitter.com/fQvm2A3ViM— dylan (@dylarrno) December 19, 2017

Interestingly enough, during that same interview, Eminem tackled homophobia accusations, Trump and the current political climate, and his creative process. Read it in full here.

[Photo: Getty Images]
title: Eminem Said He Uses Tinder And Grindr To Find Dates And Some Fans Are Confused
